email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this message finds you well.

We have a vessel available for an iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao. The vessel, MV OCEANIC PRIDE, has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. The laycan is 1-5 October. We are offering a freight rate of $22/MT on CIF terms.

Please let me know if this is of interest.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. We are seeing rates closer to $19/MT in the current market. Can you adjust your offer?

Also, could you confirm the stem status and the vessel's performance in similar routes?

Best regards,
James Wilson
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

Thank you for your prompt response. I can adjust the freight rate to $20/MT. The stem is confirmed, and MV OCEANIC PRIDE has a strong performance record on this route, with an average speed of 14 knots and no reported issues.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

$20/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and send over the contract details. Also, what is the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

Great! The laycan is confirmed for 1-5 October. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day pro rata. I will send the contract details shortly.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We look forward to receiving the contract details.

Best regards,
James
